refCache.description: REF_PATH and REF_CACHE need to point to the md5 sum cache for SvABA to process CRAM files (see http://www.htslib.org/workflow/). Created with PopulateCache in calling/calling.wdl

svabaIndexedReference.description: BWA index must be generated using BWA version compatible with BWA distributed with SvABA for SvABA to process CRAM files. Created with SvabaIndex in calling/calling.wdl

scatterIntervalsHcs.description: 50 intervals to divide the genome into for parallel calling

ponTarGz.description: HG38 GRIDSS PON resources required for somatic call filtering. Downloaded from https://nextcloud.hartwigmedicalfoundation.nl/s/LTiKTd8XxBqwaiC?path=%2FHMFTools-Resources%2FGRIDSS

kouramiFastaGem3Index.description: For use with BAMs aligned to any reference gs://nygc-comp-s-fd4e-input/All_FINAL_with_Decoy.fa.info

kouramiFastaGem1Index.description: For use with BAMs aligned to any reference gs://nygc-comp-s-fd4e-input/All_FINAL_with_Decoy.fa.info

kouramiReference.description: For use with BAMs aligned to any reference. https://github.com/Kingsford-Group/kourami/blob/master/scripts/download_panel.sh

fastNgsAdmixChroms.description: file containing list of chromosomes to use as search space for angsd

fastNgsAdmixContinentalSites.description: Continental level sites file for use with FastNGSAdmix

fastNgsAdmixContinentalSitesBin.description: Continental level sites file for use with FastNGSAdmix bin

fastNgsAdmixContinentalSitesIdx.description: Continental level sites file for use with FastNGSAdmix idx

fastNgsAdmixPopulationSites.description: Population.bi level sites file for use with FastNGSAdmix

fastNgsAdmixPopulationSitesBin.description: Population level sites file for use with FastNGSAdmix bin

fastNgsAdmixPopulationSitesIdx.description: Population level sites file for use with FastNGSAdmix idx

fastNgsAdmixContinentalNind.description: count of number of patients used to generate reference panel for separated by continental categorization

fastNgsAdmixPopulationNind.description: count of number of patients used to generate reference panel for separated by population categorization

fastNgsAdmixContinentalRef.description: reference panel for continental level ancestry estimation

fastNgsAdmixPopulationRef.description: reference panel for population level ancestry estimation

cosmicCoding.description: https://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/download v92 VCF file of all coding mutations( normalised ) in the current release. The file has the variants 5' shifted as per the VCF standard, and the info part contains the 3' shifted syntaxes for cds and genome, along with the unshifted variants in the OLD_VARIANT field.

cosmicNoncoding.description: https://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/download v92 VCF file of all non-coding variants( normalised ) in the current release. The file has the variants 5' shifted as per the VCF standard, and the info part contains the 3' shifted syntaxes for cds and genome, along with the unshifted variants in the OLD_VARIANT field.

cosmicCensus.description: https://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/download v92 A list of all cancer census genes from the current release in a comma separated table. The census table is exported from http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/census and the format is the same.

cancerResistanceMutations.description: https://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/download v92 A tab separated table listing the details of all mutations in COSMIC which are known to confer drug resistance.

cosmicActionabilityData.description: https://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/download v93 A tab separated table of Actionability information and a read me file. Please Note: This file is based on GRCh37 assembly.

cosmicHallmarks_Of_Cancer.description: https://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/download v92 A tab separated table listing the hallmarks of cancer for a subset of cancer census genes.

chdGenesVcf.description: congenital heart disease (CHD)  genes. Adult patients with CHD may have an increased incidence of cancer

chdEvolvingGenesVcf.description: congenital heart disease (CHD)  genes. Adult patients with CHD may have an increased incidence of cancer

chdWhitelistVcf.description: congenital heart disease (CHD)  genes. Adult patients with CHD may have an increased incidence of cancer

masterMind.description: Annotates any variant with an associated paper

svabaIndexedReference.description: BWA index must be generated using BWA version compatible with BWA distributed with SvABA for SvABA to process CRAM files. Created with SvabaIndex in calling/calling.wdl

scatterIntervalsHcs.description: 50 intervals to divide the genome into for parallel calling
